features: 2 IN 1 STEAMER IRON: Our portable mini ironing machine with dry and wet ironing modes for all ironing needs. Pressing the button releases steam from the 8 steam vents for wet ironing, or without the button pressed for dry ironing. 5s preheating, up to 150°C (302°F), ironing a shirt in just 3 minutes. Allows you to iron all clothing, curtains, sheets, etc. easily and quickly, remove wrinkles.

FOLDABLE HANDHELD IRON: Our portable lightweight clothes steamer iron is great for travel, vacations. The collapsible steamer handle can be rotated 180°, the folded size is about 5inch and weight is 1lbs, only the size of an iPhone plus cell phone, can flat ironing and hanging ironing. Your can put it into suitcases and backpacks without taking up too much space.

CERAMIC PANEL DESIGN: The lightweight steam iron features a smooth ceramic soleplate design that keeps the soleplate at an even temperature, glides smoothly over clothes without burning them, and easily removes all wrinkles and creases from clothing. The head of the soleplate with pointed corners provides flexibility for ironing buttons, lapels, collars and other narrow areas.

LARGE CAPACITY WATER TANK: Our compact electric steamer iron with a small measuring cup, you can easily refill the iron with water, the iron water tank has a capacity of 100ml/3.4oz, which is enough to iron a suit jacket, a pair of pants, a shirt. (After use, please pour out the excess water to avoid water overflow from the water inlet.)

SAFETY & ANTI-BURN DESIGN: Our clothing wrinkles remover steamer iron with insulated base, after use you can place the iron on the base to cool down and avoid getting burned. In addition, it is suitable for ironing a wide range of fabrics, including: organic fabrics, nylon blends, wool, cotton, linen, chemical fibers and more!
body.description: MEINV 970W travel portable mini steamer iron can help you effectively remove all types of clothing wrinkles and deep cleaning.2023 NEW 2 IN 1 STEAMER IRONFAST WARM-UP: 1000W high power, 5 seconds warm-up, maximum temperature up to 150°C.180° FOLDING: The handle supports 0-180° flexible switching, easy to store and carry.WET AND DRY 2IN1: Garment iron with dry iron and wet iron can meet various needs.HIGH QUALITY MATERIAL: Ceramic material, smooth surface, fast heating, smooth sliding, fast wrinkle removal.POINTED CORNER DESIGN: Flexible ironing on buttons, lapels, collars and other narrow areas.PRODUCT SPECIFICATIONVoltage: 120V 240VPower: 1000WPower cord length: 57inch(145cm)Material: aluminum die-casting, ceramicSteam holes: 5Water tank capacity: 100MLSteam duration: 13g/minProduct size: 6.1*3*4.25inch / 15.5*7.7*10.8cmWeight: 1.08lb / 0.49kgPreheating time: 5sMaximum temperature: 150°CPRODUCT LISTSteamer Iron x 1 PcsMeasuring Cup x 1 PcsBase x 1 PcsManual x 1 Pcs

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Compact—Lightweight—Heats Up Quickly
reviews.reviewText: This little Travel Steamer Iron is, if anything, very compact and lightweight. It heats up in mere seconds. The handle rotates to the 90° and 180° positions. You might get the idea from the seller's pictures that this is cordless, but it's not. It has a 56" electrical cord attached at the butt of the handle (see my pictures). Unlike most irons, it lacks temperature adjustment. The soleplate has a cradle with silicone bumper pads to protect surfaces when the iron is cradled.Filling it is easy: turn the handle 90° to gain unobstructed access to the filling port. Pour the water in slowly because it fills up quickly. Also, make sure to close the silicone cap tightly. Unfortunately, I didn't receive a fill cup with the steamer☹. It works surprisingly well. I used it to steam out some fold wrinkles in a shower curtain while it was hanging, and I had no problems. It puts out more steam than I thought it would, but that comes with one limitation: it uses water quickly. If you want to dry iron, don't depress the button.Conclusion: This item met my expectations, which is my requirement to receive a four-star review. If it had temperature adjustment and the fill cup wasn't missing, it would likely have exceeded my expectations and received a five-star rating. I also wish they would show it with the cord in at least one of the pictures. So, four stars for the Travel Steamer Iron.
